title: Intensive Short-Term Course on Political Ideology Education Using Intelligent Platforms

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental political concepts and experience using online learning tools
context.additional_context: A blended learning environment combining an intelligent learning platform with real-time online sessions, offering customized political ideology education for working professionals.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze three political philosophy theories and present real-life application cases through an intelligent platform
Learners can structure and express their opinions in discussions with peer learners using collaboration tools within the platform
Learners can establish concrete implementation plans applying political philosophy concepts to practice through project-based assessments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
